marital-status.marital-status: What is your current marital status?
marital-status.provide-sin: Provide the SIN of your current spouse or common-law partner. The information is required to calculate your adjusted family net income.
marital-status.required-information: Your spouse or common-law partner must submit their own application or renewal for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
marital-status.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to share their personal information.

error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Enter year of birth, for example 1950
error-message.yob-is-future: Year of birth must be in the past
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique

confirm-phone.add-phone: Adding a phone number will help the Government of Canada contact you if there is an issue with your renewal. Otherwise, we'll contact you by mail.

add-or-update.legend: Would you like to receive email communication from Sun Life and the Government of Canada?
add-or-update.help-message: Email communication will help the Government of Canada and Sun Life contact you regarding your Canadian Dental Care Plan membership. Otherwise we'll contact you by mail.

error-message.add-or-update-required: Select whether you would like to add or update your email
error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.confirm-email-valid: Enter confirmation of email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

confirm-address.have-you-moved: Would you like to update your mailing address?
confirm-address.is-home-address-same-as-mailing-address: Is your home address the same as your mailing address?
confirm-address.help-message: The address we have on file can also be found on the renewal letter you received from Service Canada.

error-message.has-address-changed-required: Select whether or not you want to change your mailing address
error-message.is-home-address-same-as-mailing-address-: Select whether or not your mailing address and home address are the same

home-address.use-mailing-address: My home address is the same as my mailing address

address-field.address-note: Include apartment number (if applicable), street number, street name. For example: 123 Main Street Suite 4B

address-suggestion.address-selection-legend: Please select an address option below:
address-suggestion.description: We found a suggested correction for the address you entered.

address-invalid.description: The mailing address you entered appears to be invalid. Please review the details below.

mailing-address.postal-code-required: Postal code or Zip code must be provided
mailing-address.invalid-postal-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the mailing address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
mailing-address.invalid-postal-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected

home-address.postal-code-required: Postal code or Zip code must be provided
home-address.invalid-postal-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the home address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
home-address.invalid-postal-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected

error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()

dental-benefits.title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a federal social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a provincial or territorial social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program you are covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program you are covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

dental-insurance.title: Access to other dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Do you have access to dental insurance or coverage:

list.employment: Through your employment benefits or a family member's employment benefits, including health and wellness accounts
list.pension: Through your pension benefits or a family member's pension benefits
list.purchased: Purchased by you or a family member or through a group plan from an insurance or benefits company
list.professional: Through a professional or student organization

dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, I have access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.option-no: No, I do not have access to dental insurance or coverage

additional-info.title: Additional information
additional-info.eligible: Exception: You may still be eligible if you are retired and:

list.opted: you opted out of pension benefits before December 11, 2023, and
list.cannot-opt: you can't opt back in under the pension rules

additional-info.not-eligible: You are still considered to have access to dental insurance or coverage if you choose to opt out of benefits provided through your or a family member's:
additional-info.not-eligible-note: As such, you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
additional-info.not-eligible-purchased: If you purchased your current dental insurance policy privately on your own, you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan while that coverage is in effect.

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether you have access to dental insurance

review-information.read-carefully: Review this information carefully. The information provided will be used to update your Canadian Dental Care Plan member account.

spouse-consent.label: Consent
spouse-consent.yes: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
spouse-consent.no: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has not consented to sharing of their personal information.

review-information.dental-insurance-title: Access to other dental insurance or coverage:
review-information.dental-benefit-change: Change answer to government dental benefits
review-information.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
review-information.submit-p-proceed: By proceeding with this renewal, you are agreeing to attest truthfully to the information provided.
review-information.submit-p-false-info: If you provide false information on your renewal, you and others you applied for may be removed from the plan.
review-information.submit-p-repayment: If you or your family members were not eligible to renew, you or your family member may have to repay the full cost of care received through the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

exit-application.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to exit this application? If you click "Exit", the form will reset and the information will be lost.
exit-application.click-back: Click "Back" to return to the form.

confirm.page-title: Your renewal for the Canadian Dental Care Plan is complete!
confirm.keep-copy: Keep a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-text: You will not receive a confirmation email. It is important to keep a copy of your application. You can use this button to print.
confirm.begin-process: We will begin processing your renewal application immediately. You can continue to use your Canadian Dental Care Plan benefits.
confirm.cdcp-checker: You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> to track the progress of your renewal application or to receive more information. You will receive a letter within two weeks of submitting your renewal application to let you know if you're eligible for the upcoming benefit year.
confirm.register-msca-title: Register for a My Service Canada Account (MSCA) - Coming soon
confirm.register-msca-text: Register for a My Service Canada (MSCA) account to view letters sent to you from the Government of Canada about your Canadian Dental Care Plan membership.
confirm.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
confirm.consent-answer: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
confirm.dental-private: Access to dental insurance or coverage

alert.title: Help us improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan
alert.survey: This short survey has 5 demographic questions and will take 3 minutes of your time. It will open in a new window.
alert.answers: Your answers will help Health Canada improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan and make sure our services are accessible to everyone.

modal.info: By closing the application, you will end your session and any information entered will be cleared from your browser. Make sure you printed or save a copy of your application code.
modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to close the application?

demographic-survey.improve-cdcp: Answering these questions is optional. Your answers will help Health Canada improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan and make sure our services are accessible to everyone.
demographic-survey.confidential: The information collected will only be used for statistical purposes and will be kept confidential.
demographic-survey.impact-enrollment: Your completion of the demographic questions will not impact your enrolment in the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
demographic-survey.indigenous-status: Are you First Nations, MÃ©tis or Inuk (Inuit)?
demographic-survey.disability-status: Do you indentify as someone with a disability?
demographic-survey.disability-help-message: A person with a disability is a person who has a long-term difficulty or condition, such as vision, hearing, mobility, flexibility, dexterity, pain, learning, developmental, memory or mental health-related impairments, that limit their daily activities inside or outside the home such as at school, work, or in the community in general.
demographic-survey.ethnic-groups: In our society, people are often described by their race or racial background. These are not based in science, but our race may influence the way we are treated by individuals and institutions, and this may affect our health. Which category(ies) best describes you? Check all that apply:
demographic-survey.gender-help-message: Gender refers to current gender which may be different from sex assigned at birth and may be different from what is indicated on legal documents.
